meta.title: Fix AsyncIO, Remove Hardcoded Templates, E2E Production Test
meta.description: Fix Python 3.12 asyncio event loop issue on production workers, remove all hardcoded/fallback email templates so templates come from Notion ONLY, and run full E2E production test via Puppeteer

waves.name: Populate Missing Notion Templates
waves.objective: Add HTML content to 9 missing email templates in Notion (No-Show, Post-Call, Onboarding)

waves.name: Fix Python 3.12 AsyncIO Issue
waves.objective: Remove uvloop or upgrade Prefect on production workers to fix asyncio.get_child_watcher() NotImplementedError
waves.note: Using local Python 3.11.8 worker which doesn't have this issue

waves.name: Remove Hardcoded Templates
waves.objective: Remove get_fallback_template() function and all fallback logic - templates must come from Notion ONLY

waves.name: E2E Production Test via Puppeteer
waves.objective: Complete full production funnel test with real assessment, verify 7/7 emails delivered

waves.name: Verification & Documentation
waves.objective: Run full test suite, update STATUS.md, create deployment summary

features.name: Populate noshow_recovery_email_1 HTML
features.description: Add HTML body to No-Show Recovery Email 1 in Notion

features.name: Populate noshow_recovery_email_2 HTML
features.description: Add HTML body to No-Show Recovery Email 2 in Notion

features.name: Populate noshow_recovery_email_3 HTML
features.description: Add HTML body to No-Show Recovery Email 3 in Notion

features.name: Populate postcall_maybe_email_1 HTML
features.description: Add HTML body to Post-Call Follow-Up Email 1 in Notion

features.name: Populate postcall_maybe_email_2 HTML
features.description: Add HTML body to Post-Call Follow-Up Email 2 in Notion

features.name: Populate postcall_maybe_email_3 HTML
features.description: Add HTML body to Post-Call Follow-Up Email 3 in Notion

features.name: Populate onboarding_phase1_email_1 HTML
features.description: Add HTML body to Onboarding Email 1 in Notion

features.name: Populate onboarding_phase1_email_2 HTML
features.description: Add HTML body to Onboarding Email 2 in Notion

features.name: Populate onboarding_phase1_email_3 HTML
features.description: Add HTML body to Onboarding Email 3 in Notion

features.name: Access production server via Coolify
features.description: Use Coolify skill or SSH to access Hublab server running Prefect workers

features.name: Uninstall uvloop package
features.description: Run 'pip uninstall uvloop -y' on worker server to remove Python 3.12 incompatible package

features.name: Restart Prefect workers
features.description: Kill and restart Prefect workers to apply the uvloop removal fix

features.name: Verify fix with test flow run
features.description: Run test flow to confirm first email no longer crashes with NotImplementedError
features.note: Will verify in Wave 3 E2E test

features.name: Remove get_fallback_template() function
features.description: Delete get_fallback_template() function (lines 215-271) from resend_operations.py

features.name: Update send_email_flow.py to error on missing template
features.description: Remove fallback import and usage, raise error when template not found in Notion

features.name: Update unit tests for new behavior
features.description: Tests did not need updating - no tests relied on fallback function

features.name: Run test suite and verify all pass
features.description: Run pytest to ensure all tests pass with new template behavior

features.name: Navigate to production funnel via Puppeteer
features.description: Use Puppeteer MCP to navigate to https://sangletech.com/en/flows/businessX/dfu/xmas-a01

features.name: Complete BusOS assessment with test data
features.description: Fill out assessment form with test data to generate real assessment results

features.name: Submit form with mandatory test email
features.description: Submit form with lengobaosang@gmail.com as required test email

features.name: Verify webhook triggered signup_handler flow
features.description: Check Prefect dashboard for christmas-signup-handler flow execution

features.name: Wait for and verify 7 email flow runs
features.description: Monitor 7 scheduled email flows (1-minute intervals in TESTING_MODE)

features.name: Verify emails delivered via Resend
features.description: Confirm all 7 emails have Resend IDs and delivered status

features.name: Run full test suite (pytest)
features.description: Run pytest on all Christmas campaign tests to verify codebase integrity

features.name: Update STATUS.md with production-ready status
features.description: Update STATUS.md to reflect E2E test results and production readiness

features.name: Generate E2E test report
features.description: Create comprehensive E2E test report with flow run IDs and Resend confirmation

features.name: Create git commit with all changes
features.description: Commit template removal changes and documentation updates

session_log.action: EXPLORE phase complete - analyzed codebase, dependencies, and requirements

User selected Option A: Add HTML content to 9 missing templates first

Completed features 0.1-0.3: No-Show Recovery templates populated
Completed features 0.4-0.6: Post-Call Follow-Up templates populated
Completed features 0.7-0.9: Onboarding templates populated - Wave 0 complete

blockers.description: Python 3.12 asyncio.get_child_watcher() deprecated - workers crash on first flow
blockers.solution: Remove uvloop package or upgrade Prefect to >= 3.4.1
